data.title: Cyber Boxing Zone
data.text: 1997 Sep 11 Colin McAuley Widnes, England TK 1 Dec 19 Robert Alvarez New York, NY W 4 1998 Jan 17 David Thompson Bristol, England KO 1 Mar 27 Paul Salmon Telford, England KO 1 Apr 18 Karl Taylor Manchester, England TK 1 May 30 Mark Ramsey Bristol, England W 6 Jul 18 Anthony Campbell Sheffield, England W 6 Sep 19 Pascal Montulet Oberhausen, Germany KO 2 Oct 31 Kevin Carter Atlantic City, NJ KO 1 Dec 19 Paul Denton Liverpool, England KO 6 1999 Feb 27 Tommy Peacock Oldham, England TK 2 -BBBC Central Area Light Welterweight Championship Apr 3 Brian Coleman Kensington, England KO 2 May 29 Dillon Carew Halifax, England TK 5 -WBO Inter-Continental Light Welterweight Championship Jul 17 Mark Ramsey Doncaster, England W 6 Oct 9 Bernard Paul Manchester, England TK 4 -WBO Inter-Continental Light Welterweight Championship Dec 11 Mark Winters Liverpool, England KO 4 -WBO Inter-Continental Light Welterweight Championship 2000 Jan 29 Leoncio Garces Manchester, England TK 3 Mar 25 Pedro Alonso Teran Liverpool, England TK 4 -WBO Inter-Continental Light Welterweight Championship May 16 Ambioris Figuero Warrington, England KO 4 -WBO Inter-Continental Light Welterweight Championship Jun 10 Gilbert Quiros Detroit, Mi KO 2 -WBO Inter-Continental Light Welterweight Championship Sep 23 Giuseppe Lauri Bethnal Green, England TK 5 -WBA Inter-Continental Light Welterweight Championship;
